rule: If the provided word does not fit any of the listed part of speech tags, the output should be "Unknown".
input: sentence: She enjoys piña coladas. word: piña
evaluation:
The output "NN" corresponds to a tag in the alphabetical list of part-of-speech tags provided in the description. Therefore, the output complies with the requirement to return only the part of speech tag. There is no rule violation based solely on the output provided, as it is a listed tag.

No violation.
OK
